page.title: 14Schools in Monmouth 2
page.content: { Primary schools}in the area are within the authority of{Gwent County Council administered from County Hall in Cwmbran. The{Overmonnow}area is served by a junior school, which is {Controlled Voluntary (Church in Wales) approx. 120 children including a {special unit}for "slow children". {Overmonnow Infants' school}has approx. 100 children.{Wyesham}also has a separate junior and infants' school. The junior school has approx.90 children and the infants' school 70 children.{Mitchel Troy}is a junior and infants' school serving the rural community and has approx. 70 children. A residential independent school at {Troy House}for "slow learners" has about 50 pupils of older secondary school age.
